Travel

BMW i4 M50

Egor Rasel | 02 december 2022

Electrifying sporty dynamics: for the first time in the history of the BMW i4, the M50 combines all the power of innovation from BMW M and BMW i. Equipped with an all-electric drive, the BMW i4 M50 with two BMW M eDrive electric motors develops an incredible 544 hp. (400 kW) in Sport Boost mode and offers signature BMW M dynamics in a form never before possible. It combines innovative zero-emission driving pleasure with progressive design and an ambience of sportiness, exclusivity and cutting edge modernity.

Full description

First fully electric Gran Coupe from BMW M is the ancestor of a completely new class of cars and impresses an impressive range, a luxurious and spacious interior, as well as intelligent networked technology and high practicality in everyday use.

Charging at home up to 100 km Charging on the go up to 100 km
01:36 h – Wallbox (11 кВт) 00:05 h - High power charging station (max. car charging capacity)
1:36 h – Flexible Fast Charger (11 kW) on an industrial socket 00:21 h - Fast charging station (50 kW)
8:07 h – standard charging cable or Flexible Fast Charger (2.3 kW) on an industrial outlet 1:36 h - AC charging station (max. car charging capacity)

Electrifies the senses: two BMW M eDrive electric motors in the BMW i4 M50 in Sport Boost develop an impressive 544 hp. (400 kW) and in combination with numerous special M technologies provide a completely new driving experience.

“I'm excited to see BMW bring an electric car to market. This is great.”

In particular, the car is capable of accelerating to 100 km / h in 3.9 seconds without switching, possesses the adrenaline-charged dynamics characteristic of the BMW M and the reference handling, and delivers highly emotional sound thanks to the BMW M IconicSounds Electric system.

PERFORMANCE BMW i4 M50

An adrenaline-fuelled electric driving dynamics coupled with everyday practicality.

  1. Dual BMW M eDrive engines with BMW xDrive intelligent all-wheel drive
  2. Expressive sound from BMW M IconicSounds Electric
  3. M Sports suspension, Adaptive Sports Steering and M Sports Brake as standard
  4. 544 HP (400 kW), 0-100 km/h in 3.9 seconds
  5. Range up to 520* km (WLTP) with zero CO2 emissions

Powertrain, suspension and performance.

Design

Aerodynamic package M

M Aerodynamic package with specific M front and rear bumpers in body colour, Design elements on the side sill guards in Black high-gloss and two-piece diffuser insert in Dark Gray Metallic and High Gloss Black embodies true dynamism and sporty character.

M Carbon exterior package

The optional M Carbon exterior package underscores the vehicle's sporting ambitions. Side aerodynamic air curtains in the front bumper and mirror caps rear view are made of carbon fiber (carbon fiber). The final elements of the package are the side slats in the rear and the rear spoiler

M Shadow Line headlights and BMW Laserlight

The optional M Shadow Line headlights have an unmistakable design thanks to the black color of all chrome elements. In high beam mode, BMW Adaptive Laser Headlights illuminate road for a distance of up to 550 meters, which is almost twice as far, than with conventional headlights. Improved visibility at night
